metadata.title: CVE-2014-2528 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
kcleanup.cpp in KDirStat 2.7.3 does not properly quote strings whendeleting a directory, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrarycommands via a ' (single quote) character in the directory name, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2014-2527.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2528` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

k4dirstat - 2.7.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: k4dirstat package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.5-1').
